media:group.media:title: 24 Oras Weekend Express: June 6, 2020 [HD]
media:group.media:description:
Narito ang mga balitang ating tinutukan ngayong Sabado, June 6, 2020:
- 265 OFW, dumating sa Clark Int'l Airport
- Lalaking inabutan ng lockdown, 3 buwang stranded sa Cebu
- 69-anyos na ginang, patay matapos ma-trap sa nasusunog na bahay
- Nadisgrasyang oil tanker, nagliyab at sumabog
- Meralco bill ngayong Hunyo, laman ang 4 na buwang konsumo ng mga customer
- Mga stranded na OFW sa NAIA, naghihintay ng eroplano pauwi ng Davao
- Brgy. San Vicente at Brgy. Poliwes, 6 araw nang naka-lockdown dahil pasaway raw ang mga residente
- Rep. Joey Salceda, umatras bilang co-author ng Anti-Terrorism Act of 2020
- Bumbero, sinorpresa ng proposal ang kaniyang nobya
For Kapuso abroad, subscribe to GMA Pinoy TV (http://www.gmapinoytv.com/) for GMA programs, including the full version of 24 Oras Weekend.
24 Oras Weekend is anchored by Ivan Mayrina and Pia Arcangel, featuring top news stories from the Philippines. Visit GMA News Online (http://www.gmanews.tv/24Oras) for more.
Subscribe to our YouTube channel for updates about the novel coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the Luzon-wide lockdown or the Enhanced Community Quarantine (ECQ).

entry.title: DTI to barber shops set to reopen on June 7: Follow health protocols

media:group.media:title: DTI to barber shops set to reopen on June 7: Follow health protocols
media:group.media:description:
Department of Trade and Industry Secretary Ramon Lopez on Saturday reminded barber shops that are allowed to reopen on June 7 strictly follow health protocols under the general community quarantine (GCQ).
